tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE inventory (id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name VARCHAR(255), quantity INT);
CREATE TABLE out_of_stock (id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_id INT, reason VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE InventoryItem (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_name VARCHAR(255),
stock_quantity INT,
out_of_stock BOOL);

CREATE TABLE InventoryLogs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
log_description TEXT,
log_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE InventoryUpdateHistory (update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
updated_quantity INT,
update_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE inventory_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    update_id INT,
    previous_stock_count INT,
    new_stock_count INT,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);
